Control Name: PERF 2.1 Evaluate the available compute options
Control Statement: Understand the performance characteristics of the compute- related options available to you. Know how instances, containers, and functions work, and what advantages, or disadvantages, they bring to your workload.

control_attributes.Control: PERF 2.1 Evaluate the available compute options
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you select your compute solution?
